summary: The video features a medical professional discussing factors that accelerate aging and slow it down. Stress is identified as a factor that ages a person faster. Factors that slow down aging include sleeping, exercise, sunscreen, not smoking, and decreasing sugar intake. The professional also mentions NAD (or NMN) as a supplement and recommends staying out of the sun and stopping smoking to reduce wrinkles. Sugar is identified as a dietary component to cut for skin health.
transcript: What will age you fastest? What will age you fastest? What will slow down the signs of aging? What will slow down the signs of aging? Stress. Sleeping, exercise, sunscreen, not smoking, decrease sugar, etc. A lot of health related stuff. Exercise, sleeping, sunscreen, not smoking, decrease sugar in your diet. And then we can get into other stuff like peptide therapy and NAD. And skincare. What's a product you can't live without? NAD. What's a free way to reduce wrinkles? Stay out of the sun. What would you cut out of your diet to help your skin? Sugar. What supplement is your secret weapon? NAD or actually NMN. I take it. It's a precursor to NAD.
